title: Pinky Monkey x FaFa Collaboration Animation: At Afternoon of Sunny Day
original_name: ピンキーモンキー x ファーファ コラボ動画 - at afternoon of sunny day -
sinopse:
A collaboration anime between Frente International's Pinky candy mascot and Nissan Soap's Fafa laundry mascot.

North American viewers may recognize Fafa under a different name "Snuggle". The mascot for the fabric softener brand owned by Sun Products.
